description:
When i try to create Openstack essex most of the time the SQL Server is not communicating with openstack server  and it fails,Not able to get the login page. 
command :
sudo ./osinstall.sh -f 172.16.1.0/24 -f 11.1.0.0/16 -s 512 -p eth2 -t demo -v qemu

When i type the above command it says SQL Server error.
title: Unable to connect the SQL server with openstack server most of time while installing openstack essex
